description: It took police officers nearly five hours to break up a massive house party in Jackson, New Jersey, that violated Gov. Phil Murphy's executive order limiting indoor gatherings to 100 people.
content:
(CNN)A house party in New Jersey was so packed with partygoers openly flouting the state's Covid-19 crowd guidelines this weekend that it took police officers over 5 hours to break it up.
